## Lecture 4a

What is the correct way to vectorize the following code:
```
for(i in 1:3) x[i] <- i+i
```

* `x <- c(1,2,3) + c(1, 2, 3)`
* `for(i in range(1,4)) x+= [i+i]`
* `while(i<4) x+= [2i]`
* `for(i<4) x[i] <- 2i`

* QI = IQ*

* mean(age)
